note.text: Tensions between various ethnic groups are a major cause of instability within Pakistan. Geographic regions and political parties are frequently divided along ethnic lines. Ethnicity is also closely tied to social class and identity.

In general, Pakistanis trust fellow members of their own ethnic group over others. When meeting local Pakistanis, it can be helpful to bring along a cultural adviser from their same region or ethnic group to make the meeting go more smoothly.
